Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Issue triage for 1.14.1 & 2.0.1; issue voting reminder

I just voted for the fixing of the encoding issue I reported. This one
is I think really critical.

I did not see any bugs for better documentation for the 2.0 series but
it would really be important too IMHO.

Jean-Noel

On Thu, Jul 17, 2008 at 9:46 PM, Gordon Mohr <gojomo@...> wrote:
> At IA, we will soon be performing final triage of outstanding issues to
> be fixed for a 1.14.1 bugfix release and a 2.0.1 bugfix release.
>
> As a reminder, our JIRA issue tracking system allows you to vote on
> issues, and we review the list of voted issues when making decisions
> about what to tackle in upcoming releases.
>
> Of course, any registered user can also comment on issues to describe
> related implementation possibilities, and contribute patches as issue
> attachments.
>
> You can browse Heritrix issues via:
>
> http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER
>
> You can view issues currently slotted to be addressed for upcoming
> releases via the 'Roadmap' link. (Though, until a release is actually
> made, the release names, dates, and contents are always subject to change.)
>
> - Gordon @ IA
>
>
